product_name: Smith Backdrop Polarized Photochromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: In and out of shadows and from sun-up to sun-down, the Smith Backdrop polarized photochromic sunglasses are your single eyewear for sun protection. Photochromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight Techlite(TM) lenses feature high-quality borosilicate glass that is polished and chemically tempered for increased shatter resistance. Polarized photochromic copper lens tint provides medium contrast with excellent definition; double-sided hydrophobic coating sheds water. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Frames feature spring hinges to accommodate a multitude of head sizes. Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits a medium-size face. Protective case included.
